description:
William`s butler Kevin has come to the academy to act as a priest.  Shocked by Kevin`s suddenly cold demeanor, William decides to skip boating lessons.  On his way back to the dorms, he notices the Head Boy, Nathan, acting suspiciously around the dormitory mother`s room.  Combined with Dantalion`s unease around Nathan, it seems there is more to him than meets the eye.
Source: crunchyroll
